# Introduction

<!-- indian oil sardine is important -->
The Indian oil sardine (*Sardinella longiceps* Valenciennes, 1847) is one of the most commercially important fish resources along the southwest coast of India (Figure `r ref("fig:studyarea")`) and comprises ca 25% of the catch biomass [@Adleretal2016]
